AfroBeats

AfroBeats Royalty Protocol

Decentralized IP registry and royalty distribution platform for Afrobeats artists. Built on Camp Network with AI-powered plagiarism detection.

Launch AppView on GitHub

IP-NFT Registry

Register your music as on-chain intellectual property NFTs with ERC-6551 token-bound accounts

AI Plagiarism Detection

Audio fingerprinting and similarity checking using machine learning and vector databases

Automated Royalties

Smart contract-based streaming revenue distribution with real-time oracle data

IP-Fi Lending

Borrow against future royalty streams with decentralized lending pools

IPFS Storage

Decentralized storage for audio files and metadata via Origin SDK and Pinata

Gasless Onboarding

Meta-transactions enable frictionless user experience without gas fees

Built with ❤️ for the Afrobeats community
